name: Football Match Game
description:
It's the right time to take advantage of brain waves. Moving exercise for the brain. For our children who love cartoons and football, we created classic memory card game.
Find two of the same cards, with a favorite cartoon character dedicated to the World Championship in Qatar 2022. There are cards with universal characters that refer to football. It is planned to insert cards with as many flags of different countries, so we will also achieve love for geography.
The most beautiful way to get to know through the game!
publishers: NS WEB DEVELOPMENT DOO NOVI SAD
